episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Future-Ready Communities
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Future-Ready Communities.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down Sharon AI to Deploy 1K B200 Cluster at NEXTDC M3 Data Center Using Lenovo Infrastructure and VAST Data and You don't need a bird feeder — this hardy plant with bountiful berries will keep birds flocking to your yard, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into future-ready communities, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
